About universAAL Remote Interoperability Suite

-

Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
universAAL Remote Interoperability Service Gateway This is an HTTP Gateway for handling HTTP request
universAAL Remote Interoperability Internet Gateway Internet Gateway
universAAL Remote Interoperability Space Gateway Module for inter-AALSpace communication with multitenant capabilities.
universAAL Remote Interoperability SOAP Server -
universAAL Remote Interoperability SOAP Service -
universAAL Remote Interoperability Remote-API Manager Module for deploying a remotely-accessible API to access uAAL MW core features
universAAL Remote Interoperability Remote-API MySQL Add-on Additional Fragment for Remote-API Manager that enables the use of MySQL for the persitence database
universAAL Remote Interoperability Keep-alive Receiver Bundle that receives Events with SpO "System-alive-true" and checks periodically if a tenant has stopped sending them.
universAAL Remote Interoperability Keep-alive Sender This bundle sends Context Events with SpO "SystemInfo-alive-true" periodically, to indicate the system is still running.
universAAL Remote Interoperability Karaf Feature -
